name: Friday night funkin but somthings off
name_original: Friday night funkin but somthings off
description: So ths might seem to you as trash and dumb low effort mod, but you dont know what a pain in the ASS is making all the models, music and everything from "scracth" so after the daddy model broke i decided to publish this buggy mod into the internet i might do some updates thou so stay tuned. And it will be on HTML until version 1.5 soooo.
